concept.title: CMM support for show command to display 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN (Feature f13406-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature introduces a new show command on the CMM that displays 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN. The input parameters include the PLMN and the radio access type. The output is the PLMN, the RAT type and the IMSIs. This feature is supported for the 2G/3G/4G/5G.

conbody.p: The new CLI command is created to query the lead IPDS map table to display at most 100 IMSIs matching PLMN (MCC, MNC) entered. The command does a slow walk on the lead IPDS UE context map. The output displays the list of the IMSIs belonging to the PLMN. The CMM has CLI to clear the list collected.
